timeline.message:
wappalyzer: Persist enable state

* ExtensionWappalyzer - Add necessary variables and functionality to
handle enable state.
* TechPanel - The enable toggle is associate with the param (enable
state).
* WappalyzerParam - New class extending AbstractParam to handle the
enable state.
* wappalyzer.html - Updated help content to contain a short bit about
the toggle button and persistence.
* CHANGELOG - Added change entry.

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: The config should not be explicitly saved (it already is when ZAP shuts down).
timeline.author: thc202
thc202

timeline.bodyText: Extend VersionedAbstractParam, makes it easier to migrate options if/when needed.
